## Transfer HTML files to the reports folder.


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{bash}
mv ./*rpt1*.html ../../rpt1_MetadataProfiling.html
mv ./*rpt2*.html ../../rpt2_ReadPreprocessing.html
mv ./*rpt3*.html ../../rpt3_SequenceProcessing.html
mv ./*rpt4*.html ../../rpt4_PreliminaryAnalysis.html

rm *.html
```


## Clean the Rmd folder. Remove other html files
```{r}
rmOthers <- c("*.html")
    if(exists(rmOthers)) {
        rm(list = rmOthers)
    }
```
